title: The Breaking Season
description: A sexy stand alone arranged marriage romance from USA Today bestselling author K.A. Linde...I signed on the dotted line. A marriage contract to seal my union with the devil.I thought I knew what I was doing. His money and name were mine for the taking. But Camden Percy always gets exactly what he wants. And what he wants is me—my body, my obedience, my surrender.He wants to break me.But I’m Katherine Van Pelt. I’ll never break. I’ll never beg. I’ll never give in.Except I promised him one more thing—a baby. A Percy heir.There’s no way out of this one. Either I comply or lose everything. Do I risk the husband I’m just learning to love or is this my breaking season?
author: K.A. Linde
